scripts.logs: pipenv run chalice logs --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage beta > chalice.log
scripts.logs-prod: pipenv run chalice logs --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage prod > chalice.log
scripts.start: cross-env DEV_COGNITO_IDENTITY_ID=us-east-1:1e3aa7b7-b042-4834-98f1-7915985c39a5 AWS_PROFILE=ashwin-cff-lambda pipenv run chalice local --stage dev --port=8001
scripts.deploy: pipenv run chalice deploy --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage beta
scripts.deploy-prod: pipenv run chalice deploy --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage prod
